import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { deleteStudentFromDatabase, fetchUserStudentByIds, } from "../services/studentServices" export const Student = ({ user }) => { const [student, setStudent] = useState({}) const { studentId } = useParams() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserStudentByIds(user?.id, studentId).then((data) => { setStudent(data[0]) }) } const handleDelete = () => { deleteStudentFromDatabase(student.id).then(() => { navigate("/students") }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [studentId, user]) return (

  • Name:

    {student?.firstName} {student?.lastName}

  • Grade:

    {student?.grade?.grade}

) }
